tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE top_grossing_films (
  film_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  film_title VARCHAR(255),
  director VARCHAR(100),
  year_released INT,
  box_office_revenue DECIMAL
)
CREATE TABLE films (film_id INT PRIMARY KEY, film_title VARCHAR(255), box_office_gross DECIMAL(10, 2))
CREATE TABLE film_ratings (film_id INT, viewer_rating DECIMAL(4, 2), critics_rating DECIMAL(4, 2))

CREATE TABLE films (
    film_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR,
    year INT,
    gross_income DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE genres (
    genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE film_genres (
    film_id INT,
    genre_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    film_id INT,
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE years (
    year INT PRIMARY KEY,
    films_count INT
)
